content: Yes, you can report a possible Fair Housing Act violation to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) through their website or contact their toll-free hotline at 1-800-669-9777 (voice) or 1-800-877-8339 (TTY). You can also file a complaint with your local Fair Housing Assistance Program (FHAP) or with the U.S. Department of Justice. It's important to note that there are strict time limits for filing a complaint, so it's best to do so as soon as possible after the alleged violation occurs.
